sentences.english: Heat surroundings cosiness index is a important target of energy efficiency design in buildings.

sentences.english: The illumination energy saving on Dayaowan container stack yard is dismissed based on the illumination theory.

sentences.english: The designing of laminating system is one of the key techniques in the designing of energy-saving and environment-protecting laminators.

sentences.english: High efficient to light, hight color index, energy-saving.

sentences.english: High-efficiency water heaters can drive down home energy costs.
sentences.chinese: 高效節能熱水器可以大大降低家庭能源費用。

sentences.english: We will increase our energy-saving capacity by an equivalent of 80 million tons of standard coal.

sentences.english: Cooling water flows back to the heating bucket and saves water and energy.

sentences.english: Energy-saving home gas stoves have been the national technology patents.

sentences.english: The high-efficiency and energy-saving pot has the characteristic of high heat energy utilization rate.

sentences.english: Energy saving and loss reduction are significant considerations of Chinas power grid companies for rural power supply.

sentences.english: We will strive to conserve energy and reduce emissions.

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an energy saver for an AC contactor, which is composed of a starting part and a holding part.
